title.narrative: Multi- sectorial response on child protection and SGBV services for 370 boys , girls and adolecents at medium to high risk (Direct target 370) Refugees from Palestine and Syria in South: 4 camps and 6 gatherings , in Ain El helwi camp , in Saida,Bourjchamali , Rashidieh and Al Bass camp in Tyre (6 gatherings in Tyre are Maachouk,Jelelbahar , Qasmiye,Wasta , Shabreeha and Bourghlieh) In addition, to two palestinian camps in Beirut and Mount Lebanon that are Shateel and BourjBarajneh.

description.narrative: Multi- sectorial response on child protection and SGBV services for 370 boys , girls and adolecents at medium to high risk (Direct target 370) Refugees from Palestine and Syria in South: 4 camps and 6 gatherings , in Ain El helwi camp , in Saida,Bourjchamali , Rashidieh and Al Bass camp in Tyre (6 gatherings in Tyre are Maachouk,Jelelbahar , Qasmiye,Wasta , Shabreeha and Bourghlieh) In addition, to two palestinian camps in Beirut and Mount Lebanon that are Shateel and BourjBarajneh.
